mapper.delete: delete spg,t1 from sys_permission_group as spg left join sys_permission_group_menu as t1 on t1.permission_group_id = spg.id where spg.id in (#{permissionGroupId})
mapper.select:
select count(1) from `sys_permission_group` where is_del = 0
and `name` like concat ('%',#{keyword},'%')

select spg.id as permissionGroupId, spg.`name`, t1.menu_id as menuIds from `sys_permission_group` as spg inner join( select menu_id,permission_group_id from sys_permission_group_menu where permission_group_id = #{permissionGroupId} )as t1 on t1.permission_group_id = spg.id where spg.is_del = 0 and spg.id = #{permissionGroupId}
